name: Green Chili and Corn Dip
author: sal
summary: A fondue dish is the perfect way to keep this thick, cheesy dip warm and melted. Corn, green chile peppers and tomato chunks make for a rich, spicy and satisfying accompaniment to tortilla chips.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups whole peeled tomatoes, drained and chopped
¼ cup whole kernel corn, drained
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers
directions: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, mix tomatoes, corn, milk and flour
Cook and stir until thick and bubbly, about 10 minutes
Gradually blend in Cheddar cheese and diced green chile peppers
Continue cooking until cheese has melted, about 10 minutes
